Protective Spiral.name: Protective Spiral
Protective Spiral.flavor: The whirling wings of your swarm form extend out, cutting your enemies before spiraling protectively around your friend.
Protective Spiral.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. An ally within 2 squares of you gains temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Great Winged Samara.name: Great Winged Samara
Great Winged Samara.flavor: Seeds erupt around you, blinding your enemies and then whirling around you, ready to blind again.
Great Winged Samara.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Great Winged Samara.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain two benefits while you are in beast form: You can shift 2 squares as a minor action, and whenever you score a critical hit against an enemy, that enemy is blinded (save ends).

Dark Wings.name: Dark Wings
Dark Wings.flavor: Pieces of your beast form cling heavily to any who dare slash at you.
Dark Wings.trigger: You use wild shape to change into beast form
Dark Wings.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you become insubstantial and can move through enemiesâ€™ spaces while you are in beast form.
